about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a frontend developer with experience in Angular, React, and JavaScript. I thrive on collaboration, continuous learning, and delivering quality work. I love contributing to the tech community through GitHub and exploring innovative solutions with teams.

projects.name: Angular Portfolio
projects.description: A dynamic portfolio built using Angular and GitHub API to showcase repositories and contributions.

projects.name: Ang RSS Reader
projects.description: An RSS reader app built with Angular and Feedbox to aggregate tech feeds in a simple interface.
